commands.name: Get-AzQuotaRequestStatus
commands.description:
Get the quota request details and status by quota request ID for the resources of the resource provider at a specific location.
The quota request ID **id** is returned in the response of the PUT operation.

examples.description: Get the quota request details and status by quota request ID for the resources of the resource provider at a specific location. The quota request ID **id** is returned in the response of the PUT operation.
